web/src/components/tailadmin-ui/index.js.description: AlertDialogDescription now uses useAlertDialogContext() to get descriptionId and applies it as the id attribute. This connects to aria-describedby in AlertDialogContent. Both AlertDialogTitle and AlertDialogDescription follow the same pattern for ARIA accessibility.

web/src/components/tailadmin/ui/modal/in.description: Modal component now uses useFocusTrap hook to trap focus when modal is open. Import added from @/hooks, and useFocusTrap(modalRef, isOpen) called after modalRef declaration. Combined with existing ARIA attributes (role='dialog', aria-modal='true'), the Modal now has full accessibility support for focus management.

web/src/hooks/useFocusTrap.ts.description: New useFocusTrap hook implements focus trapping for modal components. Accepts containerRef and isActive boolean. Exports FOCUSABLE_SELECTOR constant. Stores previously focused element, traps Tab/Shift+Tab, and returns focus on cleanup.

tests/alert-dialog-accessibility.spec.ts.description: Comprehensive Playwright E2E tests for AlertDialog accessibility. Tests verify ARIA attributes (role='alertdialog', aria-modal='true', aria-labelledby, aria-describedby), Tab/Shift+Tab keyboard navigation with focus trapping, Escape key to close dialog, focus return to trigger element, and overlay click to close. Tests navigate to /app/machines and interact with pause confirmation dialogs on MachineCard components.
